translation.en: 3654. We have foot pursuit outside of PNC Park.
translation.es: 3654, persecución a pie fuera del parque PNC.

translation.en: 3169, here on Stockton Avenue. Heading down.
translation.es: 3169, en la avenida Stockton. Va hacia abajo.

translation.en: 438972. Suspect description, black jacket, black pants.
translation.es: 438972, buscamos a alguien con chaqueta y pantalón negros.

translation.en: Mayor requests we lock down. Lock it down on all four corners.
translation.es: No dejen que escape. Repito, aseguren las cuatro esquinas.

translation.en: Copy.
Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
translation.es: La persona va a pie. Repito, va a pie.

translation.en: Can we confirm present location of suspect?
Got eyes on the suspect. Following.
Dispatch, 3227. Be advised, suspect is entering PNC Park.
translation.es: Móvil 3227, la persona está entrando al parque.

translation.en: On the move!
- I'm on- site. - Move!
Unit One- Two. I got your call. Negative.
We have no visual. We have got no ID at this time.
translation.es: Se nos perdió de vista, no sabemos dónde está.

translation.en: Suspect is on the roof.
Officers in pursuit.
Ray!
Just come with me, okay?
I'm here to help.
It's over.
Just…
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
No, no, no, no!
The past is like a dream.
translation.es: El pasado es como un sueño.

translation.en: There are memories that shape us,
molding us into what we've become.
A mosaic of images and feelings
translation.es: Un mosaico de imágenes y sentimientos

translation.en: that offers some truth about how we got here,
translation.es: que muestran un poco cómo llegamos aquí.

translation.en: even if details have blurred with time.
translation.es: Aunque los detalles se vayan borrando.

translation.en: - You know this is all yours? -
What ya lookin' at, man?
I'm lookin' at you, woman.
- I love you. - Love you too.
As the years pass, we realize
translation.es: Con los años, nos damos cuenta

translation.en: we are nothing more than the experiences that made us.
translation.es: de que solo somos las experiencias que vivimos.

translation.en: - Hi, Amanda. - Hi.
- Doc. - Mr. Cooper.
Is it back?
Yes. We'll go over the options,
but Infirmam is still the most effective way to cure this type of cancer.
translation.es: pero Infirmam es lo mejor para curar este tipo de cáncer.

translation.en: We've already leveraged everything.
translation.es: Ya gastamos todo lo que tenemos.

translation.en: The pain has brought us closer together.
translation.es: El dolor nos unió más todavía.

translation.en: And watching her grow… has been to find myself again.
translation.es: Y verla crecer hizo que me encontrara de nuevo.

translation.en: Surprise!
Here, mama. This is for you.
I mean, it's not much, but it's all they had at the gift shop.
translation.es: No es mucho, pero es lo que había en la tienda.

translation.en: - Oh. - Her name is Paloma.
translation.es: - Se llama Paloma. - Mamá, es perfecto.

translation.en: No, it's perfect. Thank you, Mom.
translation.es: - Se llama Paloma. - Mamá, es perfecto. Gracias.

translation.en: But sometimes I wonder,
Are these my memories, or are they hers?
translation.es: ¿son mis recuerdos o los de ella?

translation.en: - - Put your hips into it. Again.
- Ooh. - Ooh, that was clean.
- Lock that wrist so it don't get weak. - It won't!
There are no rules in a fight, people do not--
translation.es: No hay reglas en una pelea, y nadie…

translation.en: - Whoa! - Fight fair!
- - How do you win an unfair fight?
- You always fight harder. - That's right.
Let me train her, Coop. She's got what it takes.
- That's my sweet girl. -
- Done. - Done?
Thank you, baby.
Parents and their children.
Where do we stop and they begin?
Mr. Cooper. Ray.
- Doc. - I have good news.
We just got word
translation.es: Hay una versión genérica muy eficiente de Infirmam

translation.en: a very effective generic version of Infirmam, called Spero,
translation.es: Hay una versión genérica muy eficiente de Infirmam llamada Spero que está en trámite para ser aprobada.

translation.en: is in the final stages of FDA approval.
translation.es: llamada Spero que está en trámite para ser aprobada.

translation.en: This is great news, Ray.
Did you do this?
- You did, didn't you? - What?
This was your birthday wish, wasn't it?
I love you. Let's go tell Mom.
translation.es: Te amo. Vamos a contarle a mamá.

translation.en: We were supposed to start a new medication.
You know when that's supposed to happen?
I… You'll have to talk with Dr. Wu.
translation.es: Mejor hable con el doctor Wu.

translation.en: Dad, what's happening?
Dr. Wu? Dr. Wu!
- Hi, Ray. - What's goin' on?
translation.es: Hola, Ray. ¿Qué pasa? Dijo que Amanda empezaría con Spero pronto.

translation.en: You said Amanda was gonna start Spero soon.
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa? Dijo que Amanda empezaría con Spero pronto.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Amanda's on my list of patients to see.
translation.es: Debo hablar con Amanda y otros pacientes.

translation.en: The company that makes the generic drug
translation.es: El laboratorio que fabrica la droga…

translation.en: pulled it off the market.
What are you talkin' about?
BioPrime, the makers of Infirmam,
translation.es: La empresa BioPrime, creadora de Infirmam,

translation.en: paid the manufacturer to delay Spero's release.
translation.es: le pagó al fabricante para retrasar el lanzamiento.

translation.en: - Delay? - For how long?
Indefinitely.
Ray.
You told me that my wife was gonna be okay.
translation.es: Usted dijo que mi esposa iba a estar bien.

translation.en: I am delivering the same news to three other patients today…
translation.es: Hoy les daré la misma noticia a otros tres pacientes.

translation.en: …two of them kids.
I am so sorry.
I'm sorry.
- - Welcome back.
For those just joining, I'm here with BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
translation.es: Estoy aquí con Simon Keeley, el director general de BioPrime,

translation.en: and Congresswoman Diana Morgan of Pennsylvania.
translation.es: y Diana Morgan, congresista de Pensilvania.

translation.en: Congresswoman Morgan, why are you here today?
translation.es: Congresista Morgan, ¿por qué está aquí hoy?

translation.en: Well, I've always taken a hard line against pharmaceutical lobbies
translation.es: Siempre me opuse a la presión de la industria farmacéutica

translation.en: and mass corporations, like BioPrime.
With all due respect, Congresswoman, BioPrime is unlike any other pharmaceutical company in the world.
translation.es: Con todo respeto, BioPrime no es como las demás empresas farmacéuticas.

translation.en: - - Our scientists have created
the most effective treatments in the fight against cancer.
translation.es: los tratamientos más efectivos en la lucha contra el cáncer.

translation.en: Specifically with Infirmam, a drug that has increased life expectancy
translation.es: Puntualmente con Infirmam, aumentó un 86 % la esperanza de vida de los pacientes tratados.

translation.en: in 86% of patients treated.
translation.es: aumentó un 86 % la esperanza de vida de los pacientes tratados.

translation.en: Mr. Keeley, it is not the efficacy that's in question.
translation.es: Señor Keeley, no hablamos de la eficacia,

translation.en: It's the business practices. It's the company's business practices.
translation.es: sino de las prácticas comerciales de la empresa.

translation.en: I believe that we all have a basic human right to safe, affordable medication.
translation.es: La población tiene derecho a recibir medicación segura y económica.

translation.en: Yeah. Um, this talking point of health care as a human right.
translation.es: Sí, analicemos el tema de la salud como derecho humano.

translation.en: Our medicines, they are a matter of research and science.
translation.es: Nuestros medicamentos requieren investigación y desarrollo científico.

translation.en: The investment is not only risky, it is extremely expensive.
translation.es: La inversión no solo es arriesgada, es extremadamente costosa.

translation.en: All right. We have eager callers that wanna weigh in.
Can you please explain? Because I just don't understand.
It's crazy that a pill can cost that much.
translation.es: Es una locura que una pastilla cueste tanto.

translation.en: - Yeah, this is, uh, a tricky issue. -
Uh, and don't get fooled by the talking points of… of politicians from Washington.
translation.es: Y no se dejen engañar por lo que dicen los políticos de Washington.

translation.en: Mr. Keeley, according to your own internal documents,
translation.es: Señor Keeley, según sus propios documentos internos,

translation.en: the cost of an entire course of treatment is only four dollars.
translation.es: un tratamiento completo cuesta solo cuatro dólares.

translation.en: You're absolutely right. A… A course of treatment is four dollars.
translation.es: Está en lo cierto, un tratamiento cuesta cuatro dólares.

translation.en: But it's funny how you failed to mention the billions of dollars spent on…
translation.es: Curioso que omita los miles de millones de dólares gastados…

translation.en: - Your name? - Ray Cooper.
…rebates, discounts, insurance companies, wholesalers. Look,
I'm here because BioPrime is committed to healing the world.
translation.es: Vine porque BioPrime tiene la meta de curar al mundo.

translation.en: And if you look at the numbers, that is exactly what we're doing.
translation.es: Si miran los números, es lo que estamos haciendo.

translation.en: - That is not what you are doing. - All right.
Just to interject, our next caller is from Pittsburgh.
translation.es: Nuestra próxima llamada es de Pittsburgh.

translation.en: Ray, do you have something to say to Mr. Keeley?
My wife is dying in a hospital because you pulled Spero off the market.
translation.es: Mi esposa se está muriendo porque sacaron a Spero del mercado.

translation.en: Paying competitors to shelve generic brands of drugs?
translation.es: ¿Le pagan a la competencia para cajonear medicamentos?

translation.en: That is immoral, Mr. Keeley.
Well…  …Ray…
Is it-- Should-- Can I? Uh, I just wanna talk to Ray directly.
Listen.
Uh, first of all, I'd just like to say I'm so sorry to hear about your wife.
translation.es: Antes que nada, lamento mucho oír lo de tu esposa.

translation.en: Uh, believe it or not,
BioPrime is dedicated to saving lives.
translation.es: BioPrime se dedica a salvar vidas.

translation.en: Saving lives? You're geared towards makin' a profit.
translation.es: ¿A salvar vidas? Más bien, a hacer fortunas.

translation.en: We've already refinanced our house. I've taken every double shift I can get.
translation.es: Refinanciamos nuestra casa, trabajo doble jornada.

translation.en: You've already taken everything from me!
Ray, the sad reality is that cancer
translation.es: Ray… La triste realidad es que el cáncer suele ser una sentencia de muerte.

translation.en: is still very often a death sentence.
translation.es: La triste realidad es que el cáncer suele ser una sentencia de muerte.

translation.en: In the short term, what would we give?
What is the cost
of spending just a little bit more time with a loved one?
translation.es: de pasar un poco más de tiempo con seres queridos?

translation.en: A year, a… a month, a day?
translation.es: Un año, un mes, un día.

translation.en: Mmm, it's impossible to put a price on.
If my wife dies,
it's your death sentence.
I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
translation.es: Te buscaré y te mataré con mis propias manos.

translation.en: Dad?
What ya lookin' at, man?
I'm lookin' at you, woman.
Oh God!
No!
Fuck, no!
Amanda, no!
Bye.
- Ah, God damn it. - What? Hospital bill?
Just… put it at the bottom of the pile.
translation.es: Ponlas al fondo de la pila.

translation.en: - We can't ignore it. - Sure you can.
translation.es: No podemos ignorarlas. Claro que sí.

translation.en: - - We voted for universal health care. Just… tell 'em we're taking a political stance.
translation.es: Votamos por la atención médica universal. Diles que es una postura política.

translation.en: No, we are not eating that three nights in a row.
translation.es: No, no vamos a cenar eso por tercera vez seguida.

translation.en: - C'mon. You know you love this too. - It's not happening.
translation.es: A ti también te gusta. Ni lo sueñes. Pediremos algo con verduras.

translation.en: We're gonna order something with vegetables.
translation.es: Ni lo sueñes. Pediremos algo con verduras.

translation.en: - - Fries do not count.
- Hey! - No. Stop.
- Ah! Stop ticklin' me. -
Stop it.
- Hello? - Ray Cooper?
My name is Martin Bennett. I'm a journalist for VICE.
translation.es: Soy Martin Bennett, periodista de Vice.

translation.en: I'm doing a story on BioPrime, and I saw your call with Simon Keeley on TV.
translation.es: Sigo una historia sobre BioPrime, y vi su llamada a Keeley en la televisión.

translation.en: What do you want?
I can help you get justice for what happened to your wife.
translation.es: Puedo ayudarlo a hacer justicia por su esposa.

translation.en: No, you can't. I've been down that road.
translation.es: No es cierto. Yo ya lo intenté.

translation.en: I have proof that crimes have been committed.
translation.es: Tengo pruebas de que se cometieron delitos.

translation.en: Crimes that can land some very powerful people in jail.
translation.es: Delitos que enviarían a gente poderosa a la cárcel.

translation.en: - Keeley? - Who's that?
Especially Keeley. We need to talk in person.
translation.es: Especialmente, a Keeley. Debemos hablar en persona.

translation.en: - You can talk now. Now you have me. - Not over the phone.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no ahora? Lo escucho. No por teléfono.

translation.en: Meet me at Gateway Station in 20 minutes. I won't waste your time.
translation.es: Lo veo en la estación Gateway en 20. No lo decepcionaré.

translation.en: - - Who was that?
I'll be right back.
What do you want? Chinese or Subway?
No, it's cool. I'll come with you, and we can pick it up on the way.
translation.es: Iré contigo. Podemos comprar en el camino.

translation.en: Not gonna happen, Rae. Sit there and finish that homework.
translation.es: Claro que no. Quédate a terminar la tarea.

translation.en: That's not fair.
Life's not fair.
Chinese?
Lock the door behind me.
- I love you. - Love you.
Excuse me.
Yeah, I'm here. Where are you?
- Get on the incoming train. - You were supposed to meet me here.
translation.es: Súbete al tren. ¿Qué pasa? Íbamos a vernos aquí.

translation.en: Trust me, Ray. Just get on the train.
Are you on the train?
- Yeah. Now what? - Don't hang up. Just stay on the line.
translation.es: Sí. ¿Y ahora? No cuelgues. Quédate en línea.

translation.en: Just sit tight.
Get off at this station.
Okay, where now?
There's a woman in a striped coat and a hipster guy with a scarf.
translation.es: Ubica a la mujer con abrigo a rayas y al tipo de bufanda.

translation.en: - You see where they're headed? - Yeah. To street level.
translation.es: - ¿Ves a dónde van? - Suben a la calle.

translation.en: All right. There's a guy in a denim jacket going up the stairs.
translation.es: Hay un tipo con chaqueta de jean subiendo las escaleras.

translation.en: I want you to follow that guy. Hang back, but don't lose him.
translation.es: Sigue a ese tipo. Mantén distancia, pero no lo pierdas.

translation.en: Stand by.
Head to the south platform
translation.es: Dirígete a la plataforma sur y toma la línea roja hacia Allegheny.

translation.en: and take the Red Line towards Allegheny Station. Okay?
translation.es: Dirígete a la plataforma sur y toma la línea roja hacia Allegheny. ¿Entendido?

translation.en: Stay on the line.
- Bennett? - Yeah. Martin.
translation.es: - ¿Bennett? - Sí. Disculpa todas esas vueltas, es por precaución.

translation.en: Look, sorry about all this train hopping, but it's just a precaution.
translation.es: Disculpa todas esas vueltas, es por precaución.

translation.en: Okay, honestly, I'm a little afraid of how deep this thing might go.
translation.es: Bien, a decir verdad, temo que esto sea mucho más grave.

translation.en: What does that mean?
I got a source who told me about BioPrime's payouts
translation.es: Una fuente me habló de pagos que hizo BioPrime

translation.en: to multiple offshore shell corporations.
Bribery, cover- ups, who knows what else. All this leads to Simon Keeley.
translation.es: Sobornos, encubrimientos, quién sabe qué más. Todo lleva a Simon Keeley.

translation.en: There are other players at both the state and federal level.
translation.es: Hay más implicados a nivel estatal y federal,

translation.en: But recently, communication went silent.
translation.es: pero hace poco la comunicación se interrumpió.

translation.en: You told me you had proof.
Enough to tie Keeley to bribes that pulled Spero off the market.
translation.es: Keeley pagó sobornos para sacar a Spero del mercado,

translation.en: But without my source, I can't connect the dots.
translation.es: pero no puedo probarlo sin mi fuente.

translation.en: You're wastin' my time.
I have enough to bring public concern against BioPrime,
translation.es: Tengo lo suficiente para ir contra BioPrime,

translation.en: but I do not have enough to take them down.
translation.es: pero no para acabar con ellos.

translation.en: That's why I need you, your story.
- I just-- - Look, just think about it.
Look, Local family gets ravaged by Big Pharma's greed.
translation.es: Familia local arruinada por la industria farmacéutica.

translation.en: You gotta help me, Ray.
Family, human interest. That's what grabs headlines.
translation.es: Familia, interés humano, eso llega a los titulares.

translation.en: We can blow this thing wide open.
We can take down BioPrime. We can bring Simon Keeley to his knees.
translation.es: Podemos acabar con BioPrime y con Simon Keeley.

Dad!
Run!
Hey!
Rachel. Rachel, baby, are you okay? Look at me.
- Just like your dad. -
- Not about strength. -
Okay, top. Top. Up, up, up!
Hands up. Hands up. Move.
Again. Hit him again. Control him. Let's go.
Come on. You can take anyone.
Beautiful. There it is.
Nice. Top, top, top, top! Watch the scramble.
All right.
Hooks in. Get it. Get him in. Here.
Pick your shots.
That's it. Open him up.
- - You got it. Lock it in.
Beautiful.
Just hold. Hold, hold.
He's tapping, Rachel.
Rachel, he's tapping.
- He's tapping, Rachel. Rachel! -
Rachel!
Rachel!
Today, I am thrilled to announce a bipartisan bill
translation.es: Me complace anunciar un proyecto de ley

translation.en: that will make true progress in the war to find a cure for cancer.
translation.es: que hará grandes avances para hallar una cura contra el cáncer.

translation.en: In collaboration with the CDC and the NIH,
translation.es: Con el Centro de Control de Enfermedades y el Instituto Nacional de Salud,

translation.en: we are creating a strategic partnership with BioPrime Pharmaceuticals.
translation.es: estamos creando una sociedad estratégica con Laboratorios BioPrime.

translation.en: Thanks to the effort of BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
translation.es: Gracias a Simon Keeley, el director general de BioPrime,

translation.en: and chairman, Vinod Shah,
this bill will effectively cap the cost of treatment.
translation.es: este proyecto de ley cubrirá los costos del tratamiento.

translation.en: Finally, many of BioPrime's breakthrough treatments
translation.es: Por fin, muchos tratamientos innovadores de BioPrime

translation.en: that used to cost in the hundreds of thousands of dollars
translation.es: que antes costaban cientos de miles de dólares

translation.en: will now be available to the public at affordable prices.
translation.es: estarán disponibles al público a precios asequibles.

translation.en: I told the American people that I would hold companies like BioPrime accountable,
translation.es: Dije que les exigiría respuestas a las empresas como BioPrime

translation.en: and I have delivered on that promise.
We are cleaning out the rot.
Again?
I wasn't watching it. You were.
translation.es: Yo no lo puse, fuiste tú.

translation.en: I had a dream last night about that trip we took with Mom in the woods.
translation.es: Anoche soñé con aquel viaje al bosque que hicimos con mamá.

translation.en: My memory's kind of fading of her.
I don't know. It's like I'm losing these tiny pieces of her every day, and I just…
translation.es: Es como si, cada día, fuera perdiendo pedacitos de ella y…

translation.en: I don't know. I miss her. I miss our family.
translation.es: La extraño a ella y a esa familia.

translation.en: Me too.
I miss her too.
What are you planning to do?
I just need to make sense of this.
- I need to know. - Just… Just leave it alone, okay?
translation.es: - Necesito saber. - Ya… Ya olvídate de eso, ¿sí?

translation.en: They already investigated, and they didn't find anything.
Or the guy who tried to kill you.
It just was a dead- end conspiracy.
- I don't believe that. -
You don't believe that.
I need to try.
Keep it close, Mike. - I don't know how long I'll be. - Yes, sir.
translation.es: Quédate cerca. No sé cuánto tardaré.

translation.en: - Mr. Keeley. - Ah.
Appreciate it. - Don't let me go dry tonight, will you? -
translation.es: Te lo agradezco. Sigue trayéndome bebidas, ¿sí?

translation.en: Good evening.
I'm proud to kick off this first annual event
by introducing you to the CEO of BioPrime,
translation.es: presentándoles al director general de BioPrime,

translation.en: Mr. Simon Keeley.
Nice to see you, Simon.
Thank you.
Thank you very much. Hello, everyone.
T. S. Eliot said, We shall not cease in exploration.
translation.es: T. S. Eliot dijo: No dejaremos de explorar.

translation.en: We've joined forces with Goa Capital Partners
translation.es: Unimos fuerzas con Goa Capital Partners

translation.en: in hopes of raising ten million dollars…
translation.es: con la esperanza de recaudar diez millones de dólares.

translation.en: For-- That's right. I know you got it.
Excuse me.
For medicine and assistance…
for children in Africa.
translation.es: FUERA DE SERVICIO …para niños en África. Perdón, en la India.

translation.en: India. Sorry.
translation.es: …para niños en África. Perdón, en la India.

translation.en: Either way, both places need a lot of help.

translation.en: - Thanks again for coming. -
Ladies and gentlemen, Mr. Simon Keeley.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, el señor Simon Keeley.

translation.en: Simon, Simon, Simon.
India, Africa? Africa, India?
You know what? I am so sick of doing your job for ya.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Estoy harto de hacer tu trabajo.

translation.en: I'm doing my job, Simon. Everyone's here because of me.
translation.es: Yo hago mi trabajo. La gente vino por mí.

translation.en: There's some important people here.
Might want to mingle with more than your cocktails.
translation.es: Trata de socializar además de beber.

translation.en: Sure, all right. Good to see ya.
- - What the fuck?
Who would…?
- Sir? - You kidding? Give me a napkin.
…why I agree to participate in this bullshit in the first place.
translation.es: ¿Por qué acepté participar en esta mierda?

translation.en: - Let's start the auction. - Fucking balls are wet.
translation.es: - Comencemos la subasta. - Tengo las bolas mojadas.

translation.en: - It's out of order. - No shit. How'd you figure that out?
translation.es: Fuera de servicio. No me digas, Sherlock. ¿Cómo te diste cuenta?

translation.en: Sir. Sir, there's another bathroom down the stairs.
translation.es: Señor, hay otro baño por allá.

translation.en: Well, let's go to it, then. All right?
Wait here. Keep a lookout.
- Hmm? - What the… fuck?
You were warned.
If anything happened to her, I would hunt you down.
translation.es: Juré buscarte si le pasaba algo.

translation.en: All made her suffer, but she died because of you.
translation.es: Todos la hicieron sufrir, pero murió por tu culpa.

translation.en: I didn't kill anyone, you psycho fuck. Cancer did.
translation.es: Yo no maté a nadie, demente. Fue el cáncer.

translation.en: You paid someone to kill Martin Bennett.
translation.es: Enviaste a matar a Martin Bennett.

translation.en: - What? Martin? - He was investigating your bribes.
What the… What are you talking about? I don't know any Martin Bennett.
translation.es: ¿De qué hablas? No conozco a ningún Martin Bennett.

translation.en: - You're the goddamn CEO of BioPrime. - All right.
I authorize a bribe now and again, but it's not like I read the fine print.
translation.es: Autorizo sobornos de vez en cuando, pero no leo la letra chica.

translation.en: Okay, now, stop! Stop!
Fuck!
All right. Uh…
It must have been Vinod Shah. Okay?
Nothing happens without his sign- off. He's the one that brought me on, okay?
translation.es: Todo requiere su aprobación. Él es quien manda, ¿sí?

translation.en: You have no idea what you're getting into.
translation.es: No sabes en qué te estás metiendo.

translation.en: - Get him. -
Here. Handle it. Do it!
- - Fuck!
No!
Come here, you little bitch!
- - Sold! 50,000 dollars.
Rae?
Rachel.
Rachel.
Dad? You're hurt.
I'm fine. I need you to pack up. Only what we need.

translation.en: - When are we coming back? - We're not.
Is that his blood?
I… I had no choice. He had a gun.
translation.es: No tuve opción, iba a dispararme.

translation.en: I told you not to do this.
translation.es: Te dije que no lo hicieras.

translation.en: People are gonna come after us, aren't they?
I don't know.
But we need to go. Please go pack our stuff.
translation.es: Pero tenemos que irnos. Por favor, empaca.

translation.en: Go pack!
Mr. Asbury, I'm Special Agent Sarah Meeker.
translation.es: Señor Asbury, soy la agente especial Sarah Meeker.

translation.en: I already gave a statement.
Your partner, he took a bullet to the head tonight.
translation.es: Su compañero recibió un balazo en la cabeza.

translation.en: Did you hear any gunshots?
No.
Did you hear anything at all before losing consciousness?
translation.es: ¿Escuchó algo antes de perder el conocimiento?

translation.en: Somethin' about a woman.
Said, uh…
All of them made her suffer.
- Or… All made her suffer. I don't know. - What do you mean? All what? All who?
translation.es: Todos la hicieron sufrir o… todo la hizo sufrir, no sé. ¿De qué o quiénes hablaba?

translation.en: - I don't know. - Okay.
- Do you remember anything else? - No.
- - Thank you.
Come on.
But wait.
Whoever it was said they warned him.
translation.es: No sé quién era, pero ya le había advertido

translation.en: They said they'd come for Mr. Keeley if anything happened to the woman.
translation.es: que vendría por él si le pasaba algo a la mujer.

translation.en: All right. Thank you.
Let's do a check on all death threats Keeley may have gotten in the past.
translation.es: Revisemos si Keeley recibió amenazas de muerte.

translation.en: You got it.
It's a long drive to Toronto on these back roads.
translation.es: El viaje a Toronto es largo por estos caminos.

translation.en: Especially if we're not talking.
- Who throws the dice - You gonna come sit up here?
Talk to Paloma.
We ran all the Keeley death threats, and we got a match.
translation.es: Revisamos las amenazas de muerte y encontramos algo.

translation.en: Her name is Amanda Cooper.
Died at Carnegie Medical a few years back.
translation.es: Murió en un hospital hace unos años.

translation.en: Her husband's Oldsmobile was at the auction. And we found this too.
translation.es: El auto de su esposo estaba en la subasta. Y también encontramos esto.

translation.en: It's impossible to put a price on.
If my wife dies, it's your death sentence.
translation.es: Si mi esposa muere, será tu sentencia de muerte.

translation.en: I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
translation.es: Te buscaré y te mataré con mis propias manos.

translation.en: - We're gonna take-- - All made her suffer?
translation.es: Vamos a… - Todos la hicieron sufrir. - Exacto.

translation.en: - Right.  -
Let's put an APB out on Cooper's vehicle.
translation.es: Enviemos una alerta para el vehículo de Cooper.

translation.en: Here you are.
Got the ID on the driver.
Yeah.
How do you wanna handle this?
Evening.
I'll be right up.
- - This is Meeker.
You're the agent assigned to what happened at the UNICEF fundraiser.
translation.es: Usted tiene a cargo el caso de la subasta de Unicef.

translation.en: If you have any information, please call the tip line.
translation.es: Si tiene algún dato, llame a la línea informativa.

translation.en: - An agent will get back to you. - Yeah, I called the tip line.
translation.es: - La contactará un agente. - Ya llamé, pero solo hablaré con usted.

translation.en: - I told them I'm only talkin' to you. - And who am I speaking to?
translation.es: - La contactará un agente. - Ya llamé, pero solo hablaré con usted. ¿Y con quién hablo?

translation.en: Simon Keeley's death was an accident.
translation.es: La muerte de Keeley fue un accidente.

translation.en: - It was self- defense. - How do you know that? Who is this?
I'm gonna tell you everything that happened.
translation.es: Le diré todo lo que pasó.

translation.en: If you want a crime, look at…
look at what Keeley did.
How many cancer patients died because of him? Thousands? More?
translation.es: ¿Cuántos pacientes de cáncer murieron por su culpa? ¿Miles? ¿Más?

translation.en: Where are you, Rachel?
- Goodbye. - Wait, I can help you.
My dad doesn't know I'm doing this.
translation.es: Mi papá no sabe que estoy haciendo esto.

translation.en: He's a good man. He…
He just needs help.
Do you need help?
I'm fine.
But I know you think he's guilty.
translation.es: Pero sé que lo consideran culpable.

translation.en: You've all made up your minds.
But you're wrong.
He's a good, honest man.
translation.es: Es un hombre bueno y honesto.

translation.en: And I… need him.
He's all I got.
translation.es: Es lo único que me queda.

translation.en: Do you have cash?
Why?
When you can, get to a… a gas station or a Walmart.
translation.es: Cuando puedas, ve a una gasolinera o a Walmart.

translation.en: They have disposable phones, a burner.
Okay? You get one, and you call me back.
My number is 412- 046- 4378.
Okay? No one will be able to trace it. Okay? It's safe.
Now say it back to me. It's 412- 046- 4--
- - Fuck.
Where'd you get that?
Did you steal that?
I'm just looking at it.
It's fine.
What? It's not like business is booming down there.
translation.es: Ni que este lugar fuera pura diversión.

translation.en: - Twenty dollars? Seriously? -
We're not done.
Look, I know you've always taught me to do the right thing, okay?
translation.es: Sé que siempre me enseñaste a hacer lo correcto,

translation.en: But we're here because of you.
translation.es: pero llegamos a esto por tu culpa.

translation.en: Rachel, look at me. Look at me. We gotta go.
Come on.
- - FBI! We have permission to gain entry.
FBI!
Meeker.
Whoa. We definitely got our suspect.
translation.es: Vaya. Definitivamente, dimos en el blanco.

translation.en: It's Torres.
You got something?
What?
Where'd this happen?
Yeah, okay. Thank you.
So, that APB we put out on Ray Cooper's vehicle?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas la alerta que enviamos para el auto?

translation.en: It was spotted fleeing the scene
translation.es: Lo vieron en la escena de un homicidio doble

translation.en: of a double homicide 70 miles north of here.
translation.es: Lo vieron en la escena de un homicidio doble a 80 km al norte de aquí.

translation.en: Rae, I don't think I can make it to Toronto.
translation.es: Rae, dudo que pueda llegar a Toronto.

translation.en: You know those men were sent to kill us.
I had no choice.
I just hate this.
It runs, if you're askin'.
Like an odds- on favorite at the Kentucky Derby.
translation.es: Como un caballo purasangre del Derby de Kentucky.

translation.en: You take cash?
We need to stay off the road until I figure out what's goin' on.
translation.es: Mejor alejarnos de la carretera hasta saber qué hacer.

translation.en: I'm gonna look around.
You wanna come with me?
Huh?
Okay.
I'll be right back.
If they found us at the motel, they'll find us anywhere.
translation.es: Si nos encontraron en el motel, nos encontrarán en cualquier lugar.

translation.en: It's gonna be okay, Rae. I'm gonna keep you safe.
translation.es: Todo saldrá bien, Rae. Te mantendré a salvo.

translation.en: They're coming to hurt you.
That's why I need to stop this. It needs to finish.
translation.es: Por eso debo detener esto. Le pondré fin.

translation.en: I have to go after Shah.
You plan on using that?
No, but I need to be ready.
translation.es: No, pero hay que estar listos.

translation.en: Do you know how to shoot it? It's not a hunting rifle.
translation.es: ¿Sabes usarla? No es un rifle de caza.

translation.en: - - You know I do, Rae.
So, what is your plan?
It's better to have it and not need it than need it and not have it.
translation.es: Es mejor tenerla y no necesitarla que al revés.

translation.en: We need protection.
Okay, so all the values you taught me growing up are out the window?
translation.es: Bien, ¿tiramos todos los valores que me enseñaste por la ventana?

translation.en: As long as we're on the same page, dope.
translation.es: Mientras nos pongamos de acuerdo, genial.

translation.en: Shit.
- - This is Meeker.
There are people that are coming after us.
Rachel?
I don't know who. I don't know what he's gonna do, but…
translation.es: No sé quiénes son ni qué harán.

translation.en: Who, your dad?
Look, I've been tryin' to stop him, but I can't.
translation.es: He intentado detenerlo, pero no puedo.

translation.en: The only person he would ever listen to is my mom.
translation.es: Solo le hacía caso a mi mamá.

translation.en: - Can you tell me about her? - She…
She was a dancer.
She had, uh… tendinitis and stress fractures.
translation.es: Tenía tendinitis y fracturas por estrés.

translation.en: My dad, I mean, he sparred with guys who could take a punch.
translation.es: Mi papá peleó con tipos que aguantaban los golpes.

translation.en: But you could tell that they were in pain. You saw it. You know?
translation.es: Aunque se notaba que les dolían. ¿Me entiendes?

translation.en: But when my mom danced,
she'd just smile.
She always smiled.
She's tough. Like you.
You don't know me.
Debate,
gymnastics, judo junior Olympian,
a 3.5 GPA.
You've been checking up on me?
Well, I'm an FBI agent.
I do have one question.
Who is… Paloma?
How do you know about Paloma?
I'm looking at a photo that says Rachel and Paloma.
translation.es: Estoy viendo una foto que dice: Rachel y Paloma.

translation.en: I… wanted a pet.
But we couldn't get one because of my mom's treatments, so…
translation.es: Pero no podía tener una por los tratamientos de mi mamá.

translation.en: so she got me a stuffed bunny.
translation.es: Así que me compró un conejo de peluche.

translation.en: Paloma.
You…
She was always, uh, looking out for me.
Even when she couldn't.
You'd make her proud.
And your dad.
I don't know what he's gonna do.
translation.es: No sé qué va a hacer.

translation.en: Hey. Listen to me.
You are in control.
Um, but I'm… I'm not. I'm really not.
translation.es: No es cierto, de verdad que no.

translation.en: - You are in control. - Stop saying that.
translation.es: - Tú tienes el control. - Deja de decir eso.

translation.en: You are in control. You are Rachel Cooper.
translation.es: Tú tienes el control. Eres Rachel Cooper.

translation.en: Say your name.
- Rachel Cooper. - Say it again.
Rachel Cooper.
That's it.
Turn the ignition on.
What are you doin'?
- - I'm coming with you.
No, you're not.
- I'm not leaving you. - This isn't a debate.
translation.es: - No me separaré de ti. - No lo discutiremos.

translation.en: - You can't do this without me. - I am not putting you in danger, Rae.
translation.es: No puedes hacer esto sin mí. No te pondré en peligro, Rae.

translation.en: This conversation's over. Get outta the car.
translation.es: Fin de la conversación. Sal del auto.

translation.en: What about the motel?
That was unplanned. Pump the gas.
Promise you'll be back. Promise.
I'll be back.
Pinky swear.
I said, I promise.
Get outta the car.
Rae.
You always say I have to fight harder, so…
translation.es: Siempre dices que tengo que luchar más.

translation.en: What?
I need you to get outta the car.
Get outta the car.
As long as we're together, we're still a family.
translation.es: Mientras estemos juntos, seremos una familia.

translation.en: Okay? So if you can't promise me that we'll be together,
translation.es: Si no puedes prometerme que estaremos juntos,

translation.en: then I'm coming with you.
Not this time.
Put your seat belt on.
Nice house.
How you gonna get in there?
- I'm not. -
Dad.
What's this guy doin'?
Look.
Okay. Keep an eye on your sister. See you at the airport.
translation.es: Bien. Cuida a tu hermana. Nos vemos en el aeropuerto.

translation.en: Hold on.
This is Victor One. We've got a flat tire.
Stay behind.
What is this?
Something's wrong. Get us out of here.
translation.es: Algo anda mal. Sácanos de aquí.

translation.en: Forward! Go! Go! Move, move!
Just break through it! Drive!
Come on! Let's go!
Fuck.
Get me out of here.
- Finish him. - Go!
Rachel, someone else is here. Stay in the car.
translation.es: Rachel, hay alguien más. Quédate en el auto.

translation.en: You're gonna tell me why Martin Bennett was killed.
translation.es: Dime por qué mataron a Martin Bennett.

translation.en: There's nowhere to go. We can get to anyone.
translation.es: No tienes adónde ir. Podemos llegar a cualquiera.

translation.en: You killed a reporter to cover up bribes. Who were they paid out to?
translation.es: Lo mataron para cubrirse. ¿Para qué eran esos sobornos?

translation.en: Soon, some powerful people are gonna be looking for a little girl who lost both her parents.
translation.es: Pronto enviarán a buscar a una chica que perdió a ambos padres.

translation.en: Daddy!
- I know there's others. Who are they? - You don't have what it takes.
translation.es: - Sé que hay más. Quiero nombres. - Te faltan agallas.

translation.en: - - Whoa!
Go!
Dad?
- - Why can't you just listen?
You should've stayed in the car. You shouldn't have followed me to the subway.
translation.es: Debiste quedarte en el auto, no debiste seguirme al metro.

translation.en: That was the man from the subway.
We have to go.
Let's go.
Look.
- Hold on. - What are you doing?
Sit down.
If anything goes wrong, you tell them everything.
translation.es: Si algo sale mal, cuéntales todo.

translation.en: Your business with me is done.
Shah's dead.
Hmm. Shah didn't hire me.
My contract is to take out anyone who can implicate my employer.
translation.es: Mi tarea es eliminar a quien pueda comprometer a mi cliente.

translation.en: Who else are you hunting?
Only the one sitting next to me.
Something for you, darling?
No.
I know your struggle.
I do.
The village I grew up in,
we were farmers.
I worked in the fields with my father.
translation.es: Yo trabajaba en el campo con mi padre.

translation.en: And one day, a group of rebels came.
translation.es: Y un día, vinieron unos rebeldes.

translation.en: They slaughtered my entire village. Everyone. Whole family, friends.
translation.es: Mataron a todo el mundo. A todos, a mi familia, a mis amigos.

translation.en: I was able to hide in the weeds.
translation.es: Yo me escondí entre la maleza.

translation.en: Now, you gotta understand, I was just a kid, know that?
translation.es: Ten en cuenta que yo era un niño.

translation.en: In such pain, with such… rage
translation.es: Estaba tan lleno de dolor y de… rabia

translation.en: that for years, I hunted them one by one.
translation.es: que, durante años, me dediqué a cazarlos uno por uno.

translation.en: - Then you understand. - I do.
You see, what I've learned in that process
translation.es: Lo que aprendí durante ese proceso

translation.en: is that there will always be an opposing force.
translation.es: Lo que aprendí durante ese proceso es que siempre habrá corriente en contra.

translation.en: No amount of revenge can change that.
translation.es: No hay venganza que pueda cambiar eso.

translation.en: So you see, in this case,
translation.es: Así que, verás, en este caso,

translation.en: you are my village,
and I am the opposing force.
translation.es: y yo soy la corriente en contra.

translation.en: Well, there's three ways this goes down.
One, I tell those cops who we are
translation.es: Uno: les digo a esos policías quiénes somos

translation.en: and this gets real ugly for both of us.
translation.es: y esto se pone muy feo para ambos.

translation.en: Two,
I walk out the front door,
spend the rest of my life hiding in the four corners of this earth,
translation.es: me escondo el resto de mi vida por todo el mundo

translation.en: and neither of us get what we want.
translation.es: y ninguno obtiene lo que desea.

translation.en: Or three,
you tell me who hired you.
We both know I'm gonna go after them.
And when I do,
you can try to take another shot at me.
translation.es: puedes venir a buscarme de nuevo.

translation.en: This way, at least one of us gets what we want.
translation.es: Así, al menos uno consigue lo que quiere.

translation.en: Nah.
No, you've killed a few men, but…
their deaths are still fresh in your eyes.
translation.es: pero tu mirada dice que aún te duelen sus muertes.

translation.en: You're a dilettante in my world.
translation.es: En mi mundo, eres un amateur.

translation.en: I never set out to kill anyone.
Not like you.
You are not innocent.
You knew going after powerful people was a dangerous business.
translation.es: Sabías que perseguir gente poderosa era peligroso.

translation.en: You jumped.
I'm just the pavement closing in.
translation.es: Y yo soy el suelo que se acerca.

translation.en: Diana Morgan.
The person you're looking for.
The senator.
See you in Pittsburgh.
Rachel.
I'll see ya soon.
Rothman, you have kids.
Does the idea of Rachel Cooper being dragged through all of this bother you at all?
translation.es: ¿Te molesta la idea de que Rachel Cooper esté pasando por todo esto?

translation.en: Every case we work has me worried about my kids one way or another.
translation.es: Cada caso hace que me preocupe por mis hijos de una forma u otra.

translation.en: I keep thinking about her.
translation.es: No dejo de pensar en ella.

translation.en: I mean, how's…
how's a kid supposed to get past all that she's seen?
translation.es: ¿cómo se supone que una niña supere todo lo que vivió?

translation.en: I feel like…
I feel like I need to protect her somehow.
- Just do the work-- - Memo came through.
translation.es: Solo haz tu trabajo. Llegó memo. Hallaron el auto de Cooper.

translation.en: - Search crew found Cooper's vehicle. - Where?
translation.es: Llegó memo. Hallaron el auto de Cooper. ¿Dónde?

translation.en: In the woods, 20 miles outside Shah's compound.
translation.es: En el bosque, a 32 km del complejo de Shah.

translation.en: Looks like local PD got a call this morning
translation.es: La policía recibió una llamada hoy

translation.en: that a tow truck was stolen at a nearby location.
translation.es: sobre una grúa robada en un lugar cercano.

translation.en: We need eyes on all street cameras on Route 8.
translation.es: Pide acceso a las cámaras de la ruta 8.

translation.en: - I'm on it. - Thank you.
Okay. Fort Pitt Tunnel. Only 12 minutes away.
translation.es: Bien. El túnel Fort Pitt está a 12 minutos.

translation.en: War room.
Hey, guys. We got a hit on that tow truck. It's headed back to the city.
translation.es: Hay pistas de la grúa. Se dirige a la ciudad.

translation.en: Suspect is in a red tow truck. 10- 80.
License plate Romeo Tango One Seven
Uniform Alpha Sierra.
We may have something here. Westbound on Liberty passing 16th.
translation.es: Creo que la tenemos. Va al oeste, por las calles Liberty y 16.

translation.en: The chopper! It's on us.
We've got eyes on the suspect. Making a right turn on 9th.
translation.es: Tenemos visual de la grúa. Giró a la derecha en la 9.

translation.en: North on 9th. Picking up speed. Making a run for it.
translation.es: Hacia el norte por la 9, está acelerando.

translation.en: All right. Hold on, baby.
Oh shit!
Police! Stop the vehicle now!
- Where's the chopper? - It's on your right. On your right.
Pull over.
- Get outta the way! -
Oh shit!
- God damn it! Hold on. Hang on! -
All units, suspect is armed and dangerous.
translation.es: Unidades, la persona está armada y es peligrosa.

translation.en: I repeat, armed and dangerous.
The game's letting out.
translation.es: El juego llega a su fin.

translation.en: Oh shit!
- Got eyes on the suspect. - On the move!
translation.es: Objetivo a la vista, se está moviendo.

translation.en: Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
translation.es: La persona sigue a pie. Repito, sigue a pie.

translation.en: Suspect is entering PNC Park.
translation.es: Está entrando en el parque PNC.

translation.en: - Everybody clear. FBI! - Move! Out of the way!
If he's down here, we squeeze him out. I'll take the upper level.
translation.es: Si está aquí, no se escapará. Iré al nivel superior.

translation.en: PPD, cover this level. The rest, go upstairs.
translation.es: Oficiales, cubran este nivel. Nosotros subiremos.

translation.en: Suspect spotted on the upper level.
Get me agents to the roof, now!
Move!
- I got eyes on. - Copy.
Wait!
Wait.
Okay.
It wasn't right what happened to you. I understand that.
translation.es: No estuvo bien lo que te pasó. Te entiendo.

translation.en: Look, no one is gonna hurt you.
It's me. I'm here to help.
Okay?
- - I don't know you.
Yes, you do. We've…
We've been talking.
No. Paloma.
You told me your stuffed bunny's name was Paloma.
translation.es: Me dijiste que tu peluche se llamaba Paloma.

translation.en: Remember?
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
Your father was a good man.
translation.es: Tu padre era un buen hombre.

translation.en: You are not him.
- Say your name. -
You are in control.
Fuck.
You're nothing but a scared little--
translation.es: No eres más que una niñita asus…

translation.en: Rachel.
I'll see ya soon.
Say your name.
Rachel.
We're gonna be okay.
He shouldn't have been killed.
Come on, just… say… your name.
Just say your name!
Rachel Cooper.
Yeah.
We have a positive identification of the suspect. Her name is Rachel Cooper.
translation.es: Identificamos a la persona. Se llama Rachel Cooper.

translation.en: No. No, no, no, Rachel!
Her name is Rachel Cooper.
Eighteen years of age.
Any family to contact?
Both parents deceased.
- - Okay, calm down!
No!
Rachel, stop!
There you are.
I'm scared.
I feel like the whole world's gone crazy.
translation.es: Es como si el mundo entero se hubiera puesto de cabeza.

translation.en: Or maybe it's just me.
I'm tired.
Nobody cares about stopping them.
Besides me.
Will I ever get to see you and Mom again?
translation.es: ¿Volveré a verlos a ti y a mamá?

translation.en: We're with you now.
The fight begins here.
Big business and corporate interests
translation.es: Las grandes empresas y los grupos corporativos

translation.en: have corroded our politics.
And I believe that our country is on the verge of imploding.
translation.es: Yo creo que nuestro país está a punto de explotar.

translation.en: Of rotting. Rotting from the inside out.
translation.es: De pudrirse, se pudre de adentro hacia afuera.

translation.en: We need someone who will clean…
…out the rot!
translation.es: Necesitamos a alguien que limpie… - ¡Lo podrido! - …lo podrido.

translation.en: - Clean out the rot! -
Today, I am announcing my bid
to be your next senator from the great state of Pennsylvania.
translation.es: para senadora del gran estado de Pensilvania.

translation.en: That's right.
And to big business politics,
we have one thing to say.
This is our state, and it is not for sale!
translation.es: ¡este es nuestro estado y no está a la venta!

translation.en: Well done.
Entering the race is just the beginning.
translation.es: La campaña es solo el comienzo.

translation.en: Let's focus on what we wanna do when we win.
translation.es: Concentrémonos en lo que haremos cuando ganemos.

translation.en: - - Where'd you get this?
- It's Mom's. -
Actually, it's mine.
I took your mom to a Steelers game shortly after we met,
translation.es: Una vez llevé a tu mamá a un juego de los Steelers.

translation.en: and it was freezing, and I gave her my jacket.
translation.es: Estaba helado, así que le di mi chaqueta.

translation.en: And she never gave it back.
Well, now it's my turn to steal it from her.
translation.es: Ahora yo se la robo a ella.

translation.en: It's my turn to steal it from her.
Come on, baby.
Get up.
Get up, sweet girl.
Calling the FBI.
And when they get here,
you're gonna tell them everything you did with BioPrime.
translation.es: les dirás todo lo que hiciste con BioPrime.

translation.en: Go ahead. Or better yet, let me.
translation.es: Adelante. O mejor aún, llamaré yo.

translation.en: I think the FBI is looking for you, Rachel.
translation.es: Creo que el FBI te está buscando, Rachel.

translation.en: You know me?
You're all over the news.
I've seen what you did.
You bring the FBI here, and…
who do you think they're gonna arrest?
translation.es: ¿a quién crees que van a arrestar?

translation.en: - The crazy girl who killed five men? - No.
translation.es: ¿A la loca que mató a cinco hombres… o a mí?

translation.en: - Or me? - No. We never meant to hurt anyone.
translation.es: ¿A la loca que mató a cinco hombres… o a mí? No. Nunca quisimos lastimar a nadie.

translation.en: I understand, and I can help you.
I think I'm the only one who can.
translation.es: Solo yo puedo ayudarte a terminar esta pesadilla.

translation.en: - I can make this nightmare end. - Shut up!
translation.es: Solo yo puedo ayudarte a terminar esta pesadilla. Cállate.

translation.en: - You're the one behind BioPrime. - I wrestled them into submission.
translation.es: - Tú estás detrás de BioPrime. - Luché para doblegarlos.

translation.en: I got them to lower their prices. Affordable treatment.
translation.es: Hice que bajaran los precios y ofrecieran tratamientos asequibles.

translation.en: And you cleaned out the rot.
I'm fighting for you, sweetheart.
When I saw you on CNN when my mom was in the hospital,
translation.es: Te vi en CNN cuando mi mamá estaba en el hospital.

translation.en: I thought you could actually save her.
translation.es: De verdad pensé que podías salvarla.

translation.en: I believed in you.
- You still can. - How?
I know people at the DOJ.
translation.es: Tengo contactos en el Departamento de Justicia.

translation.en: They can make the charges against you go away.
translation.es: Pueden borrar los cargos en tu contra.

translation.en: And you can have a life.
What you've been through, what happened to you, was wrong, Rachel.
translation.es: Lo que viviste y lo que te pasó estuvo mal, Rachel.

translation.en: The trauma you suffered.
Don't you think they'd want me to help you, sweetheart?
translation.es: ¿No crees que tus padres querrían que te ayudara, lindura?

translation.en: - - Stop calling me that. You're a liar.
translation.es: No me llames así. Eres una mentirosa.

translation.en: You were with BioPrime even then.
You helped them take away
a cheap and lifesaving medication for my mom.
translation.es: un medicamento barato y valioso para mi mamá.

translation.en: I fought against them!
You took their bribe, and you gave them exclusive contracts.
translation.es: Aceptaste sus sobornos y les diste contratos exclusivos.

translation.en: You're responsible for ordering the hit on Martin Bennett.
translation.es: Tú ordenaste liquidar a Martin Bennett.

translation.en: You killed my dad.
Now tell the truth.
- - Tell me the truth.
Yeah.
I took the bribe.
I ordered the hit.
You don't understand anything. You're so young.
translation.es: Tú no entiendes nada. Eres muy joven.

translation.en: The candidate with the most money wins.
translation.es: El candidato con más dinero gana.

translation.en: That's how it works.
Was it worth it?
Was it worth it?
Security?
Security!
She kills Keeley and runs. Tries to escape, but something or someone
translation.es: Ella mata a Keeley y huye. Intenta escapar. Pero vuelve por algo o alguien, pese a los riesgos.

translation.en: drove her back here, despite knowing she might be caught.
translation.es: Pero vuelve por algo o alguien, pese a los riesgos.

translation.en: Yeah, but she got her revenge. Why come back?
- Just came in. - Thank you, sir.
- Holy shit. - What?
Rachel Cooper was spotted
translation.es: Vieron a Rachel Cooper en el acto de Diana Morgan

translation.en: at Diana Morgan's campaign rally yesterday afternoon.
translation.es: Vieron a Rachel Cooper en el acto de Diana Morgan ayer a la tarde.

translation.en: What was she doing there?
The fugitive from last night's assassination attempt…
translation.es: La persona que intentó asesinar a Diana Morgan…

translation.en: Thanks.
…on Diana Morgan is still on the loose.
Pittsburgh police are asking anyone with information to please come forward.
translation.es: La policía pide a la gente que se comunique si tiene información.

translation.en: First Keeley, then Shah, now a congresswoman?
It just seems so bizarre.
Rachel clearly knows something.
translation.es: Es obvio que Rachel sabe algo.

translation.en: Let's go through Diana Morgan's campaign donations.
translation.es: Revisemos las donaciones para la campaña de Morgan.

translation.en: Look at this. Rachel Cooper just sent us something.
translation.es: Mira, Rachel Cooper nos envió algo.

translation.en: I took the bribe. I ordered the hit.
The candidate with the most money wins.
translation.es: El candidato con más dinero gana.

translation.en: That's how it works.
…developments in the assassination attempt.
translation.es: …datos sobre el intento de asesinato de Diana Morgan.

translation.en: According to sources, the FBI has arrested the congresswoman
translation.es: Según las fuentes, el FBI arrestó a la congresista

translation.en: regarding her connection
translation.es: por estar conectada con los asesinatos

translation.en: to the recent murders of BioPrime executives
translation.es: por estar conectada con los asesinatos de los ejecutivos Keeley y Shah, de BioPrime,

translation.en: Simon Keeley and Vinod Shah
translation.es: de los ejecutivos Keeley y Shah, de BioPrime,

translation.en: and the two- year- old unsolved murders of Martin Bennett and Ray Cooper.
translation.es: y de Martin Bennett y Ray Cooper, que llevan dos años sin resolver.

translation.en: Neither BioPrime or the FBI would comment on this ongoing investigation.
translation.es: Ni BioPrime ni el FBI hicieron comentarios sobre la investigación en curso.

translation.en: …Pennsylvania is allegedly connected to the deaths of reporter Martin Bennett
translation.es: …de Pensilvania está relacionada con la muerte del reportero Martin Bennett

translation.en: and Rachel Cooper's father nearly two years ago.
translation.es: y el padre de Rachel Cooper, hace casi dos años.

translation.en: The past is like a dream.
translation.es: El pasado es como un sueño.

translation.en: A mosaic of images and feelings
translation.es: Un mosaico de imágenes y sentimientos

translation.en: that offers some truth about how we got here,
translation.es: que muestran un poco cómo llegamos aquí.

translation.en: even if details have blurred with time.
translation.es: Aunque los detalles se vayan borrando.

translation.en: Parents and their children.
Where do we stop…
…and they begin?
